title: Adam Roberge and Austin Killips win BWR North Carolina
content:
Dylan Johnson and Finn Gullickson finish second and third in the men’s Waffle race while Paige Onweller and Flavia Oliveira Parks round out the women’s podium.

Read the full article at Adam Roberge and Austin Killips win BWR North Carolina on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
